mapper.select: select b.id, u.id AS shopId, u.shop_name AS shopName, u.avatar, u.longitude, u.latitude, g.title, g.id AS classId from t_booking_order b LEFT JOIN t_user u on u.id=b.store_id LEFT JOIN t_store_audit s on s.create_by = b.store_id LEFT JOIN t_good_category g on g.id = s.classification_id WHERE b.store_id = #{ids} and b.create_by = #{userId} and b.del_flag = 0 and b.consent = 0
